author: radu
msg: SLING-4865 - Add support for nt:linkedFile nodes
* return the correct InputStream when calling Resource#adapTo(InpuStream.class) on a nt:linkedFile based resource
* added support for streaming the correct InputStream for nt:linkedFile based resources in the StreamRendererServlet

author: desruisseaux
msg: Consolidation in the use of loggers, especially regarding warnings during XML (un)marshalling.

author: jpountz
msg: LUCENE-6645: Optimized DocIdSet building for the "many small postings lists" case.
